name: Kawaii Pet Shop Monogatari 2
overview: The second pet breeding, role playing game with very cute animals. The player manages the requests of customers who visit the pet shop well. Customers' requests include pet capture, custody, breeding, and drug preparation. The number of pets has increased from 38 in the previous work to 60. Lots of cute mammals to unusual reptiles. There are also 10 types of competitions such as disc catch competitions, gliding competitions, and diving competitions that test the abilities of the pets that have been raised. You can use the communication function to hold competitions and exchange pets.
